lang.title: Language Settings
lang.description: Bot language used on the server

redirect.title: Redirect Settings
redirect.description: Redirect to the quote channel when a quote is created

quiet_generation.title: Quiet generation
quiet_generation.description: Generate quotes silently without 'Generating...' nor 'Created channel ...' (when redirected)

help_message.title: Help Message Settings
help_message.description: Control whether to display help messages when the bot is mentioned without a reply.

plus_feature_lock.title: Plus Exclusive Feature
plus_feature_lock.description: This feature requires a {{plan}} plan (requires {{badge}} Badge(s)).
plus_feature_lock.badge_explanation: Grant a badge to your server to unlock Plus features.

custom_message.title: Custom message
custom_message.description: Set custom message for quotes generation, i.e. replacing 'Generating...'

auto_enable_custom_quote.title: Auto-enable Custom Quote (<{{limit}} members only)
auto_enable_custom_quote.description: Normally Custom Quote is only available to individual members if they allow it, but if you have less than {{limit}} servers, you can enable this setting so that Custom Quote is available even if you have not explicitly enabled Custom Quote. Even with this setting enabled, members can still explicitly disallow Custom Quote. If a server has more than {{limit}} members, this setting will be ignored.

always_quote.title: Always Quote Settings
always_quote.description: Always quote messages when they are sent in these channel(s)
always_quote.max_channels: You can only specify up to 5 channels

role_lists.title: Role blacklist/whitelist settings
role_lists.description_1: If you are in blacklist mode, users with the specified roles will NOT be able to Quote.
role_lists.description_2: If you are in whitelist mode, ONLY users with the specified roles will be able to Quote.
role_lists.description_3: This setting does not apply to Always Quote. Please use the channel permissions settings to handle this.
role_lists.zero_warning: No one can Quote because no role is specified in whitelist mode!
